Key Match Events: Indiana responded with a 15-3 run that threatened to put the game away
Indiana turned to its All-Star Haliburton. He responded with a clutch 3-pointer that effectively put the game away with a five-point lead with 33 seconds left
Miscellaneous Highlights: Indiana’s Bennedict Mathurin and Myles Turner each recorded double-doubles
Indiana’s 12-of-26 shooting from 3-point range, compared to Orlando’s 7-of-25 from beyond the arc made a difference in the Pacers’ win
Orlando played without injured star Paolo Banchero — who scored 50 points when these two teams met last week – and the Magic lost their fifth straight
Others: Indiana held off the Orlando Magic 118-111 in the NBA on Wednesday in Indianapolis
T.J. McConnell added 15 points off the bench and matched Andrew Nembhard with a team-high five assists
